ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On the Day they are tormented by the Fire:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The day they will be burnt in the Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It will be the Day when they shall be scourged by the Fire
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the Day of Judgment they will be punished by the fire
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It will be on the day when they will be roasted in the fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (It will be) a Day when they will be Yuftanun in the Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (It is) the day on which they shall be tried at the fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon the day when they shall be tried at the Fire:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (It is) the day when they will be tormented at the Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It will be the Day when they are tormented at the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It will be the Day whereon in the Fire they will be burned
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is the day when they will be tormented in the Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (It will be) a Day when they will be tried (and tested) over the Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (It will be) a Day when they will be tried (i.e. burnt) over the Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On that Day they shall be tried at the Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Day they are presented to the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:13] on the day when they will be tormented in the Fire, that is to say, chastised in it, and it will be said to them during the chastisement:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah said: ((It is) the day) the Day of Judgement (when they will be tormented at the Fire) they will be burnt in the Fire; it is also said this means: they will be made to roast in the Fire; and it is also said that this means: they will be dragged into the Fire,
